thought.text: Hmm, the negation creates `(-1)*(-1)*B` which is not simplified. Let me check if I can simplify it:

action.old_str:
# Test negation
        if _matcoeff_isneg(arg):
            neg_arg = -arg
            print(f"  -arg: {neg_arg}")
        print()
action.new_str:
# Test negation
        if _matcoeff_isneg(arg):
            neg_arg = -arg
            print(f"  -arg: {neg_arg}")
            # Try to simplify
            from sympy import simplify
            simplified = simplify(neg_arg)
            print(f"  simplified: {simplified}")
        print()
